title: Internet working fine, yet getting lag spikes and disconnecting from the server...
body: I have reasonably good internet. I usually get around 70ms in game, and i almost never get spikes unless i'm downloading something whilst in game. Yet, just today, i've had horrible lag spikes. My fps is stable, and even when i get disconnected from the server, i can still load up all web pages and download something at my usual speed. Played two games today, the first one i had horrid lag, cost my team the win. Was never below 300ms, and always spiking. Second game, twice both teams disconnected, yet i was the only one experiencing the bad lag. Then, i disconnected from the server, and when i relogged into LoL to reconnect.. It went to the waiting for stats screen, and in my match history there is no record at all of the game. I'm assuming this is a server issue? Was just looking for some information.

replies.body:
>I'm assuming this is a server issue?

Based on everything I've seen the last few days, I'd say this is right on the money.

What OS are you on and who's your ISP?
